casebody.data:
In the Matter of T.D.P. No. 310A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 24, 2004. John Campbell, Fayetteville, for Cumberland Co. DSS. Stuart A. Brock, Winston-Salem, Robin Weaver-Hurmence, Fayetteville, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of August 2004 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent shall have up to and including the 2nd day of September 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of August 2004."
